events.text: It’s freezing out here, but I won’t let that stop me.
Every step feels heavier in this cold, but I have to keep moving.
Ice caps and glaciers are melting faster than ever, causing drastic changes to cold climates.
There’s only one plasmaror left between me and the seedbank.
I’ve fought hard to get this far, and I’m not giving up now.
My village is counting on me.
Without those seeds, their future looks bleak.
The climate is broken, poisoned by years of neglect and war.
But I still believe there’s a chance to heal it.
I have to believe that, or none of this means anything.
I carry their hopes with me on this journey.
When I bring those seeds back, I’ll give my village a chance to grow again.
That’s why I can’t stop, not now, not ever.
